preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 30 g of copper and grind it into a fine powder using a mortar and pestle. 
 2. Measure 6 g of lithium and crush it into a fine powder. 
 3. Measure 16 g of sulfur and ensure it is in powdered form. 
 4. Measure 10 g of vanadium and grind it into a fine powder. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all powders thoroughly to ensure a uniform mixture.
